attributes.title: Bad!!!
attributes.review:
When I went to download this app, it took a VERY long time. I had little patience. Not fun. Bad.

Then, after waiting what felt like YEARS, I went to open the app and find news, details, and such about our president. But guess what; it immediately shut down, and left a VIRUS on my phone!!! I didn’t think that viruses could COME from apps, but apparently they do!

Now all I have is communist leftist propaganda on my phone CONSTANTLY through ads!

Bad! Do not get! Not fun. 0/10.

attributes.title: all presidents matter 😌🙀✨
attributes.review: i downloaded this app but when i opened it all i saw was a shrimp. my grandma saw and now she’s in the hospital for ptsd! don’t download or support this man i tried emailing or calling and he hung up on me!!! then i got an email saying “vote trump 2020”. by the way i was a girl in the village doing alright then i became a princess over night, now i gotta figure out how to do it right. so much to learn and see, up in the castle with my new family; with a school that’s just for royalty.

I am really embarrassed that a Cheeto is our president. Some people can’t even tell that he’s racist to multiple people. The fact that you are getting this app is shameful. But I’ll pray for you even tho it ain’t gonna change you wrong perspective.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.review: This app took 7 months to download ✨🧚🏾 also anytime I used the app it made my phone blow up on 3 different occasions. 😾 I am now in the hospital on my death bed. I’m using the nurses phone to leave a review. I currently am dying. 🙀 This app also showed trumps 🍤. Very inappropriate. 🔞

attributes.title: The app mad my phone glitch
attributes.review: The app takes up hella storage it took weeeks weeks to down load it’s asking for private info and it played music that brought cockroaches it my my house stink phone glitch and mad my car fall apart .

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to support my wonderful amazing president. but as soon as i clicked on it to get all of the reliable information, my phone burst into flames!!!! not only that, but it caught onto my bed and now my whole house is burned to the ground. would NOT RECOMEND!!!

attributes.title: Almost died from this App
attributes.review: OK so why is trump going t ban TikTok but he can’t even worry about something that’s killing everybody  answer me that question if he’s gonna be  president why isn’t he  about coronavirus  why isn’t he but he wants to worry about this app.

attributes.title: DISGUSTIN APP
attributes.review: The app took about 4 weeks to download and then when it finally did my phone imploded and released a foul odor!!!!! I’m writing this from my new phone to tell you NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP. Now the app is on my new phone and all I can see is some nasty fat orange muffin with a mouth hole. Get me out of here!!!!

attributes.title: Very Bad App😱
attributes.review: This app is not good. I was trying to download subway surfers and i downloaded this instead😖Not only is there no subway surfers game mode in this app but it’s for some guys campaign. bruh i did not sign of for this. ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I really hope they remove this app from the App Store because it is terrible. The app did not work and should be taken off this platform and the orange man that runs it needs to be removed from office
